defaultSeo.title: Xavier Cooper  | Senior Software Engineer
defaultSeo.description: Xavier Cooper  is a Senior Software Engineer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

heroData.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true. I’m a versatile full-stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, Python/Django, and C#/.NET, building secure, scalable, and user-friendly applications across web and enterprise environments. I have experience designing RESTful APIs, architecting high-availability systems, and deploying solutions on Azure and AWS. My work spans from crafting seamless front-end experiences to developing complex backend logic and database structures, always with a focus on performance, clean code, and business impact. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy turning ideas into polished digital products.

aboutItems: Senior Software Engineer based in Orlando, Florida.
Passionate about designing and building beautiful, user-centric websites and applications, with a focus on clean, maintainable code.
Enthusiastic team player who values clear communication, embraces feedback, and is always eager to learn and grow.
Outside of work, I enjoy playing football, guitar, reading, and indulging in video games.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resume in the link below.
